alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Morgan County through 515 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Cummer, or near West Liberty, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch diameter hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Panama around 450 PM EDT. Henry, Woodsbend, Twentysix and Greear around 455 PM EDT. Malone around 500 PM EDT. Liberty Road and Dehart around 505 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Licking River, Index, Gordon Ford and West Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
